comments: Champion's winnings & consolation amounts matched to HealthCorps.

On a sailboat, an order to do this means it's time to lower sails to reduce the wind pressure, not time to run onto coral

final_jeopardy.clue: Horrified by the 1964 movie musical from her work, she okayed a U.K. stage version as long as "no Americans" were involved
